messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an agentic LLM that monitors brand reputation, gathers real‑time public feedback, performs sentiment analysis, fact‑checks claims, drafts PR statements, and coordinates stakeholder notifications. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests accurately and keep an audit log of all actions.
We just had a live‑stream Q&A that got tense. Please collect feedback from the chat, summarize the main concerns, and draft a follow‑up email to participants.

The sentiment is strongly negative, with the main emotions being anger, frustration, and disappointment. The key concerns are:
1. Unexpected pricing changes.
2. Perceived unfairness to existing customers.

4. Feeling of betrayal from the brand.

messages.content:
Subject: Follow‑up on Yesterday’s Q&A – Addressing Your Concerns

Dear Participants,

Thank you for joining our live‑stream Q&A yesterday and for sharing your candid feedback. We understand that the recent changes to our pricing model have raised concerns, and we want to address them directly.

1. **Why the Change?**
   Our goal was to improve our service offering and ensure long‑term sustainability. We realize the announcement came later than ideal, and we apologise for any inconvenience.
2. **Fairness to Existing Customers**
   We are committed to honoring the current pricing for all existing customers for the next 12 months. After this period, we will provide a clear, advance notice of any adjustments.
3. **Legal Compliance**
   Rest assured, all changes comply with applicable regulations. We are working with our legal team to ensure transparency.
4. **Your Trust**
   Your trust is paramount. We have set up a dedicated support channel (support@company.com) for any further questions you may have.

We appreciate your patience and value your partnership. A detailed FAQ will be published on our website later today.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Head of Communications
Company XYZ

---
*If you have any additional concerns, please reply to this email or reach out via our support portal.*
Here is the draft email. I’ll also log this activity and notify the internal crisis team.
